sen.j: 儀子内親王（ぎし（のりこ）ないしんのう、生年不詳 - 元慶3年閏10月5日 （879年11月22日））は、平安時代前期の皇族。
sen.e: Imperial Princess Gishi [Noriko] (date of birth unknown - November 22, 879) was a member of the Imperial family in the early Heian period.
Imperial Princess Gishi [Noriko] (date of birth unknown - November 22, 879) was a member of the Imperial family during the early Heian period.
Imperial Princess Gishi (Noriko) (date of birth unknown - November 26, 879) was a member of the Imperial family during the early Heian period.
sen.cmt: []を()に訂正しました。"22"→"26"に変更しました。

sen.e: She was Kamo-Saiin (Imperial Princess appointed to serve the deities of the Kamo-jinja Shrines).
She was Kamo-Saiin (Imperial Princess appointed to serve the deities of the Kamo-jinja Shrines).
She was Kamo Saiin (Imperial Princess appointed to serve the deities of the Kamo-jinja Shrines).

sen.j: 文徳天皇の第3皇女で、母は染殿后藤原明子（藤原良房女）。
sen.e: She was the 3rd Princess of Emperor Montoku, and her mother was Somedono-no-Kisaki FUJIWARA no Akirakeiko [Meishi] (FUJIWARA no Yoshifusa's daughter).
She was the 3rd Princess of Emperor Montoku, and her mother was Somedono-no-Kisaki FUJIWARA no Akirakeiko [Meishi] (FUJIWARA no Yoshifusa's daughter).
She was the 3rd Princess of Emperor Montoku, and her mother was Somedono-no-Kisaki FUJIWARA no Akirakeiko (Meishi) (FUJIWARA no Yoshifusa's daughter).
She was a younger maternal sister of Emperor Seiwa.
She was a younger maternal sister of Emperor Seiwa.
She was a younger maternal sister of Emperor Seiwa.

sen.j: 貞観元年（859年）10月、兄清和天皇の斎院に卜定される。
sen.e: In October 859, she was appointed as Saiin of her brother, Emperor Seiwa, by bokujo.
In October 859, she was appointed as Saiin of her brother, Emperor Seiwa, by bokujo.
In November 859, she was appointed as Saiin of her brother, Emperor Seiwa, by bokujo.
In December in the same year, she entered into Shosaiin (Hall of Initial Abstinence).
In December in the same year, she entered into Shosaiin (Hall of Initial Abstinence).
In January 860, she entered into Shosaiin (Hall of Initial Abstinence).
sen.cmt: "In December in the same year"→"In January 860"に変更しました。

sen.j: 貞観11年（869年）2月、無品から三品に昇叙される。
sen.e: In February 869, she was promoted to Sanbon (Third Order) from Muhon (no court rank).
In February 869, she was promoted to Sanbon (Third Order) from Muhon (no court rank).
In March 869, she was promoted to Sanbon (Third Order) from Muhon (no court rank).

sen.j: 貞観18年（876年）、病のため紫野斎院から出て、母の居所である染殿に移る。
sen.e: In 876, she left Murasakino Saiin due to her illness, and moved to Some-dono where her mother lived.
In 876, she left Murasakino Saiin due to her illness, and moved to Some-dono where her mother lived.
In 876, she left Murasakino Saiin due to her illness, and moved to Some-dono where her mother lived.

sen.j: 元慶元年（877年）正月に二品に叙され、更に同年11月には一品に叙されたが、元慶3年（879年）に薨去した。
sen.e: In January 877, she became Nihon (Second Order), and in November in the same year, she became Ippon (First Order), but she died in 879.
In January 877, she became Nihon (Second Order), and in November in the same year, she became Ippon (First Order), but she died in 879.
In January 877, she became Nihon (Second Order), and in December in the same year, she became Ippon (First Order), but she died in 879.
